content: Hello, I'm in the AF and I went in to BMT sept 26, 2006 graduated Nov 10, 2006 Graduated Tech school March 2007 When do i put on SrA? i know its 28mths TIG but an airman who put on A1C 2 weeks before i did already put SrA in february. Does that mean i get to put it on in march? I started counting the 28mths from when i left tech school and i don't put on until july. . .

content: Being in as long as you have now ... should should be WELL aware of what you are now and when you will become a SrA. As a matter of fact, you should already have a brand new copy of the PDG to help you sleep at night while studying for SSgt. But for your entertainment, I'll download a copy of AFPAM 36-2241 FOR YOU and tell you the exact page YOU need to read Open it up to page ... "[downloading in progress]"

title: When do i put on SrA

content: Page 348 Table 15.2 If you think you already meet that criteria, then your chain of command may have signed in the "decline promotion" block of the promo RIP that flowed down recently. Which may not be surprising if you don't already have control of yourself. Maybe they feel you're not ready for the additional responsibility Let us know what you find out ... we're all on pins and needles just dieing to find out
